Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Running AI on Azure Storage: Fast, secure, and scalable | BRK174
Description:
AI workloads require a fast and secure data infrastructure that works seamlessly. Learn how Azure Blob storage scales for OpenAI, how Azure Container Storage and Blobfuse2 ensure GPUs never sit idle, how to simplify integration with Ray/KAITO for AI apps on AKS, and how Blob storage integrates with AI services and frameworks to securely convert your enterprise data to AI-ready data. Youâ€™ll leave with best practices to drive performance, security, and developer velocity with Azure Storage.
